column4: Hello, when I'm trying to install Fifa Manager 07 with WINE, I can't continue after that a window popup which is full white with the title "Electronic Arts. Inc", what do I need to see what this Electronic Arts Inc. windows says?
i'm guessing it uses directx which AFAIK wine doesn't support  that spiffy graphic rendering stuff from MS
you know if Cedega support directx?
based on what i'm reading I would assume so
